#!/bin/sh
# test script for deploy test machines
# environment rootdir=%{git-workspace} export PYTHONPATH=$rootdir/%{tag}:$PYTHONPATH
echo Running tests on host `hostname` echo echo
# default values [ -z "$arch" ] && arch=`uname -i` [ -z "$loglevel" ] && loglevel=1
echo Cloning deploy '('tag=%{tag}')'
[ -e $rootdir ] || mkdir $rootdir
rm -rf $rootdir/%{tag} git clone -q --branch "%{tag}" https://www.rosie.io/git/public/deploy $rootdir/%{tag}
# testing pwd=$(pwd) lastmd5="/var/cache/%{tag}/md5sum" cd $rootdir/%{tag} make md5 if ! [ -f $lastmd5 ] || ! diff md5sum $lastmd5 > /dev/null; then cd $rootdir/%{tag}/dtest for os in %{oss}; do for version in %{versions}; do for arch in %{archs}; do echo echo =================================================== echo Testing repo builds for os $os-$version-$arch... python run.py --os $os \ --version $version \ --arch $arch \ --share-path $rootdir/%{tag}/share/deploy \ --log-level $loglevel \ $modules mv test.log test.log.$os-$version-$arch done done done cd - &> /dev/null cp md5sum `dirname $lastmd5` cd $pwd fi
